data.name: Managing conflicts
data.description: Understanding how differences emerge between people and applying strategies for reconciling strong opinions and finding alignment.

recommendations.markdown: This skill is especially useful for anyone who finds themselves in the position of a mediator between parties. Managers and team leads are often called in to settle disputes, and they should know how to do so fairly and in an unbiased way.

Do you follow well practiced guidelines when you're part of a conflict to ensure that it deescalates and ultimately has a positive outcome? And expert at this skill can clearly articulate the decisions they make during a conflict and why they are effective to finding a resolution.

LinkedIn Learning has a course to [Develop Conflict Management and Resolution Skills](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/paths/develop-conflict-management-and-resolution-skills) which you can access for free during a trial period.
This skill comes into effect both when you are in a disagreement with someone, or when you are pulled in to mediate a disagreement between others.

Roleplaying is a safe and effective way to practice conflict resolution skills. By practicing how to behave during a conflict in a less heated setting, you can build muscle memory for what to do when tempers are involved.
